nodes.text: The SW-3 ion cannon was manufactured by ArMek. Two of these cannons were installed on the KonGar Ship Works ATR Assault Transport.

The ArMek SW-3 was a ship-mounted ion cannon. Two SW-3s were carried by the Gamma-class ATR-6 assault transport, built by the Telgorn Corporation as a more heavily armed and armored version of the company's Delta-class DX-9 stormtrooper transport, which mounted SW-2 ion cannons.
